content: this legal text discusses the progress of a case involving the dissolution of a hereditary community the court has declared the dissolution of the community and determined the shares entitled to each party involved the court has also ordered the physical division of the properties based on a division plan provided by an expert witness additionally the court has ordered the payment of certain sums of money to the parties the court has declared the division plan enforceable and instructed the parties to carry out the necessary actions to implement the division the costs of the proceedings will be shared between the parties according to their respective shares the court has rejected objections and counterclaims raised by the defendant and has accepted the division plan proposed by the expert witness the defendant has been ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings the court has made a final decision regarding the claims brought by the parties declaring the dissolution of the hereditary community and determining the shares entitled to each party the court has ordered the implementation of the division plan and the payment of certain sums of money the court has also ordered changes in the land registry and the establishment of rights of way the defendant has been ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings and an amount of eur 500000 has been awarded to the plaintiffs the parties are jointly and severally responsible for paying the costs of the experts report
